Posts.Content: wps1959 wrote: I am sick with fear, my mother is a 30 year cancer survivor, my grandmother died with breast cancer about 30 years ago. I found the lump last week I have not been seen yet, I have only told my daughters and mother about the lump. My mothers was in her left breast mine is in my right breast. I am sick to my stomach thinking about it inside of me should I feel like this I have not told my friend yet he does not know. Trying to stay positive. Please help me. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: breast lump found wps1959 wps1959
